reviewText: I got to see this film in the UK. If you like gangster movies like, Lock Stock, Layer Cake and Snatch you will love this film. Amazingly this film is based on a true story. Tamer Hassan's performance is simply outstanding. I strongly recommend.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is shockingly bad,yes its based on a true story but its already been done,2007 rise of the footsoldier,that is one of the best brit gangster films ever made,bonded by blood dont even come close,beats me why they bothered making this,cant believe the 5 star ratings are genuine,if they are i suggest you go watch rise of the footsoldier & then review this again.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I don't understand what critics are talking about. The fact that this film is based on a true story makes it original by default! It's a gripping tale as good as any gangster movie and it was not predictable at all! Great movie for your next movie night!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is the more or less story of the rise of the infamous Essex Boys of England, big time gangsters and all around not nice guys. to me no one does gangster movies like the British and this is no exception. Gritty and violent as they no doubt were. Beware though lots of blood and gore and violence. sometimes very hard to understand but you will get the gist.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This movie was very intense, action packed, and gripping. It kept me on edge the whole time and the story is based on a real events which is even better!! A MUST SEE!
Title: N/A

reviewText: A gangster film based on a true story that will BLOW your mind. It was a bit odd for me because its a British film but I've come to love them and this was listed on my must watch movies. Lots of killing action, drug dealing and intense drama. Love, love, love, love this movie. It's like a modern version of Scarface and Snatch mixed together. Get a taste of a British gangster film. LOVE IT!
Title: N/A
